about_the_game:
A Kungfu-Noir prison drama based on Buddhist myth. Plan the perfect escape, create your own unique fighting style, join an Asura gang, and defeat The Death that Follows herself in this rogue-like character-action game.

In this game you are IMMORTAL and have no health bar to worry about. To stay that way you have to manage your RISK gauge by switching between the fighting styles and personalities of Creator and Destroyer.

Master the balance between them and play it safe or unleash the full destructive potential of each personality by putting your life on the line.

If one personality takes full control it’s true power is UNLEASHED. 

In this state you can kill anything with a single button press, but any damage taken will be lethal as your immortality is abandoned. Many other powers and abilities unique to each of the personalities are also unlocked as you play.

Escaping won’t be easy. A former bodyguard of Buddha - who is referred to only as - The Death that Follows is relentlessly hunting you with the sole purpose of avenging her master.

Explore and learn every secret of Buddha’s prison. Plan your escape carefully, choosing when to avoid or engage rival gangs and The Death that Follows. Uncover hidden shortcuts that allow you to bypass levels faster and evade pursuers on your way to freedom.

Alert level will rise based on your chosen path and decisions which can make your run extremely difficult. 

Making enemies or friends is up to you. Depending on how you treat the other inmates - the events and situations inside the prison will change every time you die. 

Be aware that former enemies might become allies and your allies might betray you if you don’t deserve their respect.

Unlock boons by answering the prayers of mortals. These grant you powers and attacks that feel almost unfair.

But as a demigod you must know that every wish granted is a double-edged sword. With each boon - comes a bane that will make the world around you more dangerous.

The combat of IMMORTAL combines stylish spectacle combat with some of the fastest platforming you have ever seen. Freely express yourself and go from offense to defense while building up your flow combo. You are always in control and the limit to how you can combine your powers is up to your imagination. Style ranking is not just for show and will earn the all-important respect of other inmates.

Enemies progress and get stronger with you, learning how to resist your favorite attacks. Stronger rivals will block, evade and combine their efforts to kill you.

Creator and Destroyer both share a single body and have to take turns controlling it.

Play as both characters at the same time or share a body with a friend in drop-in drop-out coop mode.

  • Explore and learn the 25 cell blocks comprising Buddha’s prison. Plan your escape carefully choosing when to avoid or engage rival gangs and The Death that Follows.

  • 16 asura gang lords with their own personalities who can either become your allies or worst enemies. 

  • Unlock Fudo’s full Wisdom King arsenal of over 60 skills and abilities that help in combat, platforming, deciding the fate of your enemies and finding new routes and secret tunnels in the prison.

  • Over 40 Boons to customize your movelist and fighting style, with the same number of ways to make your life harder in the form of Banes

  • The Death that Follows - will grow with you and always be there trying to end your life as you rush towards freedom.
